item.title: Christopher Walken - I Wan'na Be Like You
item.description:
Ukulele play along
I Wan'na Be Like You - The Jungle Book (2016 version) As sung by Christopher Walken Walt Disney Films
Using the chords: Am A7 C D7 E7 G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU or D DU DU DU
This version has been altered with the pitch being made more suitable for ukulele chords and the instrumental section in the middle of the song cut short.
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
